import { w3cwebsocket } from 'websocket'; import {useState, useEffect} from 'react' function ChatMessage() { let token = 'eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJ0b2tlbl90eXBlIjoicmVmcmVzaCIsImV4cCI6MTY5OTk1ODU4MiwiaWF0IjoxNjk5MzUzNzgyLCJqdGkiOiIwYTA0N2MxNTY4M2U0MzE4OGVmODUwNmQ3MWY4OGY2NyIsInVzZXJfaWQiOjF9.CiS-o2IAtERRMLasLYJerO9qDEAr0XTX3llx3uQZIZI'; const client = new w3cwebsocket(`ws://127.0.0.1:8000/chat/?token=${token}`); const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const [query, setQuery] = useState('hoa ngao'); const [chatHistory, setChatHistory] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { client.onopen = () => { console.log('WebSocket Client Connected'); }; client.onmessage = (message) => { const messageData = JSON.parse(message.data); setChatHistory((prevChatHistory) => [ ...prevChatHistory, { text: messageData.message, type: 'received' }, ]); }; client.onerror = (e) => { console.log(e); }; client.onclose = () => { console.log('WebSocket Client Closed'); }; }, [client]); useEffect(()=>{ if(query){ client.send(JSON.stringify({ query })) } }, [query]) const sendMessage = () => { if (message.trim() === '') return; // Send the message to the WebSocket server client.send(JSON.stringify({ message })); // Update the chat history with the sent message setChatHistory((prevChatHistory) => [ ...prevChatHistory, { text: message, type: 'sent' }, ]); // Clear the message input field setMessage(''); }; return (

); } export default ChatMessage;
